Introduction
This topic contains information on removing the income of dependents, including
when to remove a dependent’s income
how to remove a dependent’s income
date of income removal
in accordance with 38 CFR 3.31
, and
when a child’s income is no longer available
example 1 of removing the income of dependents
example 2 of removing the income of dependents
example 3 of removing the income of dependents
example 4 of removing the income of dependents
, and
example 5 of removing the income of dependents
.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section F - Dependents for Current-Law Pension Purposes
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section F
